issue.title: [C++] Namespace collisions with protobuf 3.15
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11724](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11724). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We define `pb` as a namespace alias in the flight sources. This conflicts with `protobuf` starting to introduce it as its global namespace alias.
